Sentencas: The direct carbon fuel cell is a special type of high temperature fuel cell that directly uses solid carbon as anode and fuel.
Titulo: Direct carbon fuel cell: Fundamentals and recent developments

Sentencas: As an electrical power generator for power plants, it has a higher achievable efficiency (80%) than the molten carbonate and solid oxide fuel cells, and has less emissions than conventional coal-burning power plants.
Titulo: Direct carbon fuel cell: Fundamentals and recent developments

Sentencas: More importantly, its solid carbon-rich fuels (e.g. coal, biomass, organic garbage) are readily available and abundant.
Titulo: Direct carbon fuel cell: Fundamentals and recent developments

Sentencas: In this review, some fundamental study results of electrochemical oxidation of carbon in molten salts are summarized.
Titulo: Direct carbon fuel cell: Fundamentals and recent developments

Sentencas: Recent developments in direct carbon fuel cell configurations and performance are also discussed.
Titulo: Direct carbon fuel cell: Fundamentals and recent developments
